comment: A boring whisky, almost no taste or peat smoke.

Dramfest 2020. I was made to try this b4 they would let me get my hands on the 30 yr as it was the only one I hadn't tried. My mind was firmly on the 30 yr old so all I remembered was yup not to bad and start pouring that 30!
Nice peaty flavor, first peaty i bought myself in dublin
